summary: Completed comprehensive testing of P&TA Snack Bestel App - Dutch office lunch ordering system with FastAPI backend and React frontend. All core functionality working correctly.
passed_tests: Backend API root endpoint responding correctly
Menu endpoint returns 124 items across 20 Dutch snack categories
Complete order CRUD operations working (Create, Read, Update, Delete)
Admin verification with PIN '1990' working correctly
Frontend loads with correct Dutch UI and dark Apple theme
Order form accepts customer name and snack selection
Order placement creates entries in orders list
Activity log access and CSV export working
Email export generates mailto links correctly
Payment link footer displays when configured
Edit mode toggle changes UI behavior
All UI elements present with proper data-testid attributes
